title: Isometric Buildings - Icon Pack
longDescription:
Are you in search of the perfect icons to enrich your game and make it more engaging and attractive to players? Our pack contains 84 unique icons specifically designed for game developers. These icons are crafted to enhance the visual appeal of your game and allow for better presentation of inventory items and various in-game elements.


âœ¨ 84 Isometric building icons in sizes 256x256,512x512 and 1024x1024 pixels are visually appealing graphic elements that are perfect for use in various projects such as mobile applications, games, and more.


📚Here's how you can use these icons in your game:



  • Displaying Inventory Items: Our icons are perfect for visualizing items in your game's inventory. They provide players with easy access to information about their loot and equipment, making gameplay more interactive and enjoyable.
  • Displaying in Notes and Books: Our icons can be used to illustrate in-game notes, books, and documents.
  • Displaying on Devices: Our icons are ideal for use on virtual devices within the game. They can serve as app icons, images on screens, or elements of the user interface. With these icons, your game will become more lifelike and appealing to players.


Our icon pack is not just a set of graphics but also a tool that will help you add uniqueness and professionalism to your game. With these icons, your project will become more convincing and enticing for players.
technicalDetails:
Features:


  • 84 Isometric building icons sized 256x256 px, 512x512 px and 1024x1024 px
  • Transparent Background
  • High quality


Number of Textures: 252


Texture Resolutions: 256*256, 512*512, 1024*1024

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
